div.head: 心肺大小腸熱
div.div: heat in the heart the lung the large and the small intestines

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Xin fei da xiao chang re

entry.def: heat in the heart the lung the large and the small intestines

sense.def: Combined Designation of xin re 心熱 , heat in the heart; fei re 肺熱 , heat in the lung; da chang re 大腸熱 , heat in the large intestine; xiao chang re 小腸熱 , heat in the small intestine. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry sha tang 沙糖 quotes Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 : 潤心肺大小腸熱，解酒 毒。臘月瓶封窖糞坑中，患天行熱狂者，絞汁服，甚良 , “It provides moisture to heat in the heart, the lung, the large and the small intestines , resolves wine poison. In the la month store it in a sealed jar in the cesspool. When the time comes where people suffer from heaven-sent (i.e. epidemi
c) heat and madness, wring the juice from it and ingest it. This is very good.”.
